content: --नाथः {1} <ab>N.</ab> of a celebrated {%Liṅga%} or the place where it was set up; (which by its splendour and enormous wealth attracted the attention of Mahomad of Ghazani who in 1024 <ab>A. D.</ab> destroyed the image and carried off the treasures); तेषां मार्गे परिचयवशादर्जितं गुर्जराणां यः संतापं शिथिलमकरोत् सोमनाथं विलोक्य . <ls>Vikr. 18. 87.</ls>
